exceptions.tactic: intros i m P i1 v1 st H1 H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: nat
m: nat
P: list (mm_instr (pos m))
i1: nat
v1: Vector.t nat m
st: nat

Goal:
mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) → st -> exists (i2 : nat) (v2 : Vector.t nat m), st = encode_state (i2, v2) /\ (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) → (i2, v2)

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
encode_state = fun (n : nat) (c : nat * vec nat n) => ps (fst c) * exp 0 (snd c) : forall n : nat, nat * vec nat n -> nat Arguments encode_state {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
encode_mm_instr : forall m : nat, nat -> list (mm_instr (pos m)) -> list (nat * nat)
mm_no_self_loops : forall n : nat, nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> Prop
one_step_forward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) → (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) → encode_state (i2, v2)
steps_forward : forall (m i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (i1 : nat) (v1 : vec nat m) (i2 : nat) (v2 : vec nat m) (k : nat), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> (i, P) /MM/ (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> (i2, v2) -> encode_mm_instr i P /F/ encode_state (i1, v1) -[ k ] -> encode_state (i2, v2)
skip_steps : forall (m k : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))) (k' : nat) (v v' : vec nat m), mm_no_self_loops (k, l ++ r) -> encode_mm_instr (k + length l) r /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v') -> encode_mm_instr k (l ++ r) /F/ encode_state (k + length l, v) → encode_state (k', v')
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (p, v) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
mm_remove_self_loops : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))), {Q : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) | mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) /\ (forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, [DECₐ x j]) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q) /\ (forall v : vec nat n, (1, P) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ <-> (1, Q) /MM/ (1, 0 ## v) ↓)}
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x (1 + i); DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
encode_mm_instr_in_inv : forall (n i : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (el : list (nat * nat)) (c : nat * nat) (er : list (nat * nat)), encode_mm_instr i P = el ++ c :: er -> exists (l : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (rho : mm_instr (pos n)) (r : list (mm_instr (pos n))), P = l ++ rho :: r /\ In c (encode_one_instr (length l + i) rho)
fractran_step_inv : forall (P : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), P /F/ x → y -> exists (l : list (nat * nat)) (p q : nat) (r : list (nat * nat)), P = l ++ (p, q) :: r /\ (forall u v : nat, In (u, v) l -> ~ divides v (u * x)) /\ q * y = p * x
fractran_step_fun : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y1 y2 : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y1 -> l /F/ x → y2 -> y1 = y2
encode_mm_instr_app : forall (m i : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))), encode_mm_instr i (l ++ r) = encode_mm_instr i l ++ encode_mm_instr (length l + i) r
in_fractran_1 : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y
fractran_step_ind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> P l x y -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (n n0 : nat), l /F/ n → n0 -> P l n n0
fractran_step_sind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> SProp, (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> P l x y -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (n n0 : nat), l /F/ n → n0 -> P l n n0
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (ii : instr) (st st' : nat * data), (fst st, [ii]) <sc P -> sss_step one_step P st st' -> one_step ii st st'
Inductive fractran_step : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop := in_fractran_0 : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y | in_fractran_1 : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y Arguments fractran_step _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_fractran_0 (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_fractran_1 (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive sss_steps (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) : nat -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop := in_sss_steps_0 : forall st : nat * data, sss_steps one_step P 0 st st | in_sss_steps_S : forall (n : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_step one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P n st2 st3 -> sss_steps one_step P (S n) st1 st3 Arguments sss_steps [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_0 [instr data]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments in_sss_steps_S [instr data]%type_scope [one_step]%function_scope [P] [n]%nat_scope [st1 st2 st3]
fractran_step_cons_inv : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), (p, q) :: l /F/ x → y < -> q * y = p * x \/ ~ divides q (p * x) /\ l /F/ x → y
fractran_step_no_zero_den : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y -> x = 0 -> y = 0
fractran_step_head_not_zero : forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (y : nat), q <> 0 -> (p, q) :: l /F/ 0 → y -> y = 0
subcode = fun (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) => let (i, li) := P in let (n, code) := Q in exists l r : list X, code = l ++ li ++ r /\ i = n + length l : forall X : Type, code X -> nat * list X -> Prop Arguments subcode {X}%type_scope _ _ /
fractran_step_bound : forall l : list (nat * nat), fractran_regular l -> {k : nat | forall x y : nat, l /F/ x → y -> y <= k * x}
MMA_HALTING = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_terminates (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTING {n}%nat_scope
MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO = fun (n : nat) (P : MMA_PROBLEM n) => sss_output (mma_sss (n:=n)) (1, fst P) (1, snd P) (0, vec_zero) : forall n : nat, MMA_PROBLEM n -> Prop Arguments MMA_HALTS_ON_ZERO {n}%nat_scope
fractran_step_no_zero_num : forall l : list (nat * nat), Forall (fun c : nat * nat => fst c <> 0) l -> forall x y : nat, l /F/ x → y -> y = 0 -> x = 0
mm_sss_DEC1_inv : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n) (k u i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), v#>x = S u -> DECₐ x k // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\ w = v[u/x]
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), m // m0 -1> m1 -> P m m0 m1

``` 
intros i m P i1 v1 st H1 H2.
unfold mm_no_self_loops, encode_mm_instr, encode_state, "/F/", "/MM/" in H1, H2.
intros H3.
destruct H2 as [H4 H5].
apply one_step_forward in H3.
- destruct H3 as [i2 [v2 [H6 H7]]].
exists i2, v2. split.
+ exact H7.
+ intros HH. apply H5 in HH. apply steps_forward with (k := 1) in HH.
  * contradiction.
  * exact HH.
- exact H1.
```

original: intros i m P i1 v1 st H1 H2. unfold mm_no_self_loops, encode_mm_instr, encode_state, "/F/", "/MM/" in H1, H2. intros H3. destruct H2 as [H4 H5]. apply one_step_forward in H3. - destruct H3 as [i2 [v2 [H6 H7]]]. exists i2, v2. split. + apply H7. + intros HH. apply H5 in HH. apply steps_forward with (k := 1) in HH. * contradiction. * apply HH. - apply H1.
